description: Wide Awake Pip is a voice activated game for young kids. It plays like an interactive storybook with mini-puzzles and games to illustrate the plot. It practices reading, story-telling, memory and problem solving skills.

title: World Views 1.0
blurb: Pick a country and discover blogs, vlogs & podcasts on it.
description: Discover countries of the world, through various perspectives. Just pick a country and World Views will show you blogs, vlogs, podcasts about your destination. If you're a travel content creator, you can also add the stories about countries you've visited.

title: Clozoom
blurb: Automatically close Zoom meeting tabs
description: Clozoom is a tiny Chrome extension that does one thing: after you click on a Zoom link to open a meeting, the extension quietly closes the tab, so it doesn’t fill up your browser windows.

title: HearHere
blurb: Stories about the people, places and history near you
description: Road trips ARE the travel market right now. HereHere is a travel audio app designed to make your next journey more interesting by sharing stories about the people, places and history of the land you are traveling through. v1 features stories in CA/OR/WA.

title: Kanaree
blurb: Liberate your clickstream data
description: Kanaree allows you to get clickstream data and funnel it into your own data warehouse. This means the data you collect is your own making it easier to integrate and see how you can make your ecommerce shop more efficient. This means more money for your brand!

title: Virtual Sun
blurb: Controllable indoor ultra-realistic skylight with sun
description: Do you wish you had a sun room? Integrate Innerscene Virtual Sun into any building to provide the ultra-realistic visual and physiological experience of being outdoors. A 3d projection of the sun follows you in the sky and changes throughout the day.

title: Sunnyside - Mindful Drinking
blurb: SMS-based alcohol tracking to improve your health & wellness
description: Sunnyside helps anyone who regularly drinks alcohol to build mindfulness and intentionality around when and how much they drink. Plan and track your drinks via 2-way text message, and see how small changes to drinking habits can have a big health impact.

title: GPT Earth
blurb: Discover new GPT-3 projects and demos.
description: Discover new GPT projects, demos and articles. Upvote your favourite content, and submit any new content to be featured.

title: Stress Less
blurb: Recognise stress & react quickly
description: Stress Less is the quickest and easiest way to recognize and react to stress. With just a few taps you can log your current stress level. Stress Less will then provide you with personalized suggestions on how to de-stress.

title: I Need a Break.work
blurb: 1-minute movement breaks that feel amazing
description: Moving makes you feel great. Which for a lot of you, might mean being more creative, in a better mood and feeling more energized. And what do you do with all that amazing feels? Build amazing things!

title: Tettra for Microsoft Teams
blurb: Search and share knowledge right inside Microsoft Teams
description: Tettra is a powerful internal knowledge base and wiki for Microsoft Teams that helps you answer repetitive questions and onboard new teammates faster. Connecting Tettra to your chat tool is the best way to make sure your team actually uses your documentation.

title: urLive
blurb: Zero-click video calling + bot-based scheduling - in one
description: Video calling like phone calling. Callers simply click your reusable urLive link to schedule or video call you from your website, email or SMS text. You or your team of up to 100, answers from their computers or mobile phones. No install. No caller login.

title: Zenbox For Remote Teams
blurb: Anxiety-free shared inbox for multiple inboxes and channels
description: https://helpwise.io/zenbox gives a tindersque approach to how pending customer queries are presented and handled by a customer support rep. It is a minimalist inbox that combines pending conversations across mutliple channels and allows you to get through them quickly.

title: Shift
blurb: Cool app for mixing podcasts and music into your workouts
description: Shift is a fitness app that lets you listen to podcasts while you're resting, and music while working out. It's really an amazing experience that makes working out way more entertaining. You'll control everything via your headphones.

title: ClipMyNotes
blurb: Export highlights from PDF files with ease.
description: Reading and highlighting PDF books and documents is very convenient. But real pain begins whenyou want to export your PDF annotations. That’s why I built ClipMyNotes which exports PDF highlights with ease and make it easier to read PDF files online.

title: Sections Ecommerce
blurb: Ecommerce Wireframing Kit for Sketch & Figma
description: Sections Ecommerce offers a wide range of ready-built layouts for your ecommerce projects. The kit includes 270+ cards in 13 popular categories to speed up and boost online shopping projects.

title: Swarm.trade
blurb: Automatically share your stock trades with your network
description: Swarm automatically group-texts your stock trades to your close family and friends. Share, discuss, and learn together to make smarter investments. Link your brokerage, form your Swarm - we do the rest! We only share what you trade, not how much you invested.

title: RTCanary
blurb: The analytics plugin for any video chat platform
description: *Chirp chirp* Think of us as New Relic for video chat. Users are quick to notice drops in call quality, so we help you pinpoint what went wrong during your calls and why.

title: Experify
blurb: Connecting you to owners of products for honest opinions.
description: Ordering online can feel like a leap of faith. On Experify you can connect with owners nearby to get an honest opinion, or test the product in real-life. Owners get rewarded by participating brands for helping others. Submit brands you like to see on Experify!

title: Domain Comet
blurb: We monitor your domains, so you don't have to.
description: Domain Comet makes it easy to monitor your own domains, your client's domains or the domains that you might like to purchase one day. We monitor registration details (registrar, status, expiry date), SSL certificates (validity and expiry) and number of pages indexed in Google.

title: Email Spam Checker by Autoklose
blurb: Send spam-free, high-converting emails
description: The Autoklose Email Spam Checker is a powerful tool built to help you create email copy without spam. Additional closing tips are displayed to offer guidance on how to engage your audience and get them to respond. Now free for all!

title: Veri
blurb: Your compass for metabolic health
description: Veri helps health-conscious individuals achieve optimal metabolic health through a blood sugar sensor and an iOS app. With Veri, users rediscover nutrition to achieve stable energy levels, increased cognitive performance, fueled workouts, and quality sleep.

title: Geekout Newsletter by Matt Navarra
blurb: The ultimate newsletter for social media professionals
description: Keeping up with the ever-changing social media landscape is a never-ending task. ⠀ Geekout by Matt Navarra is the most comprehensive weekly round-up of social media news, tips, tricks, tools, and insider information...Delivered to your inbox every Friday!

title: GetCommit by Unitonomy
blurb: Effortless knowledge capture to prepare for AI
description: GetCommit distills the messy effort and siloed work of capturing and finding information into a single experience. It complements tools your team already uses. It's as easy as forwarding an email or answering a question. Get your org's knowledge ready for AI.

title: Business Model & Lean Canvas for Notion
blurb: Create, edit and and share BMCs & Lean Canvas with Notion
description: I made these templates out of frustration of the traditional ways like PDF, PPTX, & XLS This template should help you spend your time adding thoughts, not fixing formation! I'm sharing these for all entrepreneurs for free to help end this struggle, FOREVER.

title: Forge Icons
blurb: 300+ right mix of SVG icons for your project.
description: Forge Icons is a mix of various SVG icons that you can download and use it for free in various projects. You can customize various properties of icons like stroke width, color and size on the website and preview them. http://icons.theforgesmith.com/ #iconpack

title: Crono
blurb: Android text messages & notifications on PC/Mac
description: Crono brings phone SMS & notifications on the desktop. It lets you maintain your workflow on the computer. Archive emails, reply to SMS, keep updated on the news or push files between devices! Take action on only that matters to you & cut down on distractions.

title: Brick.do
blurb: Free Notion-like tool for zero-hassle website making.
description: Brick is a super lightweight platform for creating small sites. Imagine if Google Docs was built for making sites. This is us.

title: Wing Business Assistant
blurb: An unlimited assistant built for businesses and teams
description: Wing for Business is a smart assistant that leverages humans and AI to complete any tasks your team needs. It can handle anything you throw at it, as long as it's legal, possible. One fixed monthly price, all month long! 😻

title: OffLimits
blurb: Break the rules, starting with breakfast. 🥣
description: We’re a team of cartoons and humans with big personalities taking a unique approach to cereal. We celebrate bold flavors and plant-based ingredients. In a world full of rules, we do what's OffLimits.

title: Mr Wolf
blurb: Replaces tabs with a lil' web app to help convert timezones
description: Browser Extension that replaces your New Tab with a minimalist app to help you track multiple timezones. To try it out on the web visit https://mrwolf.app No Tracking. 100% Free and Open Source. Source code available at https://github.com/beauallison/mrWolf/

title: Crowdstack Pro Community
blurb: Create a virtual community in minutes
description: A sleek modern (mobile friendly) online engagement platform to increase loyalty and drive audience growth. Your Brand. Your Rules. Your Data.

title: EQ & Remote Managers 2020 Report
blurb: Learnings from 180 interviews with remote managers
description: Meet the largest report on remote leadership and EQ. We interviewed 180 managers from 110 remote tech companies from January 2020 until now. Learn what remote managers struggle with, the impact of COVID19, and best practices for building culture.

title: Learning Hub for Founders
blurb: Pinterest for learning, recommendations from top founders
description: Learning Hub is a hub for content recommendations from top founders. It includes the curated resources from top founders on selected topics. You get new content recommendations every week. Get relevant content, boost your productivity as a founder.

title: Gather
blurb: Project management for people ops teams that live in Slack.
description: Eliminate manual coordination with smart, automated communication and coordination powered by a deep integration with Slack. Great for WFH 🏠.

title: Purity Drinking Game
blurb: Grab a drink, it's time to play "Never Have I Ever".
description: The Purity Test 🔥 Grab a 🍺, it's time to play "Never Have I Ever" with AI. A drop by the Gen Z Mafia ( http://genzmafia.com/) Photosensitivity Warning: This game contains rapidly flashing light 🚨

title: Furious Five Web
blurb: Surprisingly good 5-minute bodyweight workouts, daily
description: No sign ups, no profiles, no ads, just darn good 5-minute bodyweight workouts every day. Works great in any device. Free forever. Important: not for beginners

title: Neat – File Manager
blurb: The file manager for visual thinkers
description: Neat gives you an open-ended file manager in the cloud: integrate Google Drive, GitHub, and Slack to visualize your assets in one canvas. Control, find, preview, and open any resource. Use keyboard shortcuts to get to what you want 10x faster.

title: Vaultcomms Newsletter
blurb: Your free weekly guide to investing in commodities
description: Vaultcomms Newsletter is your personal, easy-to-understand weekly guide to investing in commodities. We’ll cover many different kinds of commodities, what they can do for your portfolio, different ways to invest in each commodity, and many more.

title: Danfo.js
blurb: Open Source JavaScript library for manipulating data.
description: danfo.js is an open source, JavaScript library providing high performance, intuitive, and easy to use data structures for manipulating and processing structured data.

title: Foli.
blurb: Bio Link Pages for Instagram.
description: Foli helps you create Bio Link Pages for your Instagram We're always excited to hear from you. If you have feedback and questions — please post below.

title: Fakespot
blurb: Spot fake reviews on Amazon to be sure you're buying quality
description: Fakespot for Chrome ensures you get the best products from the best sellers. eCommerce as it should be, for free. Amazon doesn’t always have the best price. Fakespot Offers ensures you get what you want at the best price from trusted vendors.

title: Storyform
blurb: Design short text videos directly in your browser
description: Storyform is a new product aiming at making it easier for everyone to create short marketing videos that can be used in any digital marketing channel. I have launched a demo, free to everyone, where people can create short videos and export tomp4s. Enjoy ✌️

title: BetOnWeather: Worldwide
blurb: Wager on live weather around the world, for free and cash 💰
description: BetOnWeather.io: Worldwide gives users the ability to bet and wager on over 200+ different cities across 6 different modes. From precipitation lines to temperature lines, we pretty much have it covered. Interested in joining? Request access to the beta >

title: B2B SaaS Leads
blurb: Get a list of potential customers for your SaaS in 60 secs
description: Built a B2B SaaS and wondering how to get customers? B2BSaaSLeads.com gives you a list of potential customers who have money and are already using similar technologies. Start selling in less than 60 seconds 🚀

title: Ask GA
blurb: Get answers for your marketing questions based on GA data
description: If you're not a Google Analytics guru, don't struggle with hundreds of tabs and setup! Make your marketing analytics reporting efficient and pleasant by using askGA with ready 30+ marketing dashboards.

title: Atomize by Quarkly
blurb: Library for creating atomic react components
description: Atomize is the basis for Quarkly.io components. Atomize allows you to set styles for a specific component depending on a breakpoint, configure their states, add variables from the theme, transfer the desired props to a special panel (Props tab), and more.

title: Logaster Creation Widget
blurb: Give your visitors a chance to create logos on your site!
description: Add the logo creation option to your website and help your visitors carry out an important task. This will encourage them to stay on your website longer and motivate them to come back. Users will be able to start logo creation direct on your website. You get a commission on each sale.

title: Berry’s
blurb: Get answers to all your sensitive questions
description: Q&A app for Introverted users. You can ask anonymously any question you want and participants can give honest answers knowing their response is both anonymous and helpful. It's an app that finally lets you read the mind of your friends, family & peers.

title: Hitr
blurb: Create trendy video memes for your socials
description: Hitr is an iOS app we built to make a whole new way to make short videos by customising and tuning the original video - replacing some scenes with your own stuff.

title: DeepSource Transformers
blurb: Run code formatters — on autopilot.
description: DeepSource Transformers removes the need for manual setup to make your project’s code stick to a style guide. Set it up once, and watch as DeepSource sends pull requests to your repository, or updates commits w/ formatted code in an existing pull request.

title: Color Picker
blurb: Faster than starting an application. No data is sent.
description: Color Picker online | HEX Color Picker | HTML Color Picker The goal of imagecolorpicker.com is to find a color code very quickly, faster than starting an application. The fastest way is to copy paste an image from the clipboard. There are also many other ways

title: RedditVids
blurb: Discover videos shared on Reddit in a more easy, curated way
description: During the pandemic I had some free time on my hand and decided to start a side-project and ended up building RedditVids, a website that lets you discover the video content that is shared on Reddit but in a more beautiful, curated way.

title: Fitter
blurb: Build your own branded app in minutes. No code required.
description: Deliver your health and fitness content to anyone, anywhere. Fitter makes delivering online content seamless and professional. - ✨ Customizable & whitelabeled. Your app, your brand 🚀 Launch in minutes, not months. 🌏 Available from any device

title: Jira Slack Integration 2.0
blurb: Never login to Jira again
description: All in one Jira Slack Bot. Your team will never login to Jira again. ✅ Create and update issues. ✅ Get actionable Alerts, Nudges & Reports. ✅ Conduct integrated Jira Standups. Easy, secure and most comprehensive Jira Server/Cloud integration for Slack.

title: SlimU
blurb: Your personal dietitian
description: Pair up with a top-notch nutritionist to achieve weight loss and health goals & strengthen your immune system during these dark virus times.

title: ShowMe Assist
blurb: Hand-gesture based remote support tool
description: Showme makes it possible to help, or get help, through natural human behaviour as pointing and gesturing on a live video stream - like standing next to each other. It be help with the car, garden, pc or any other problem. Perfect for remote support and work.

title: JSON Sharp
blurb: Tool for lazy developers to convert JSON to C# Objects
description: JSON Sharp is a simple lightweight converter that enables lazy developers to easily convert JSON to C# Object Initializer Syntax and most useful when you are sourcing data from JSON for unit testing.

title: Package Inc.
blurb: A simulator about designing a delivery system for a city.
description: Package Inc. is a beautiful game about designing a delivery system for a growing city. Build a connection between different hubs and feed multiple destinations, like factories, police stations, cafes, libraries, boutiques, saloons, hotels, pizzerias, pet shops or schools.

title: Callingly for Facebook Lead Ads
blurb: Get your Facebook Leads instantly on the phone
description: Callingly now integrates directly with Facebook Lead Ads. Whenever you get a new lead, Callingly automatically calls your team and puts them through to connect in seconds. Helping you and your team close deals faster.
